programme.desc: Encore: Exclusive new footage takes you inside the disaster zone, 50 years after deadly Cyclone Tracy devastated Darwin.

programme.title: Franklyn
programme.desc: Set between the parallel universe of present-day London and a futuristic metropolis, this is a fantasy thriller about four troubled souls whose worlds collide.

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: From the producers of Shaun of the Dead and Hot Fuzz, Attack the Block follows a gang of tough inner-city kids who try to defend their turf against an invasion of savage alien creatures.

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: The final Viceroy of India, Lord Mountbatten, is tasked with overseeing the transition of British India to independence, but meets with conflict as different sides clash.

programme.title: Mr. Turner
programme.desc: An acclaimed account of the great British painter who was a radical and revolutionary artist.

programme.title: Red Joan
programme.desc: Inspired by the true story of English-born Joan Stanley, who was recruited by the KGB in the mid 1930s and went undetected as a British spy for over a half a century.

programme.title: Beast
programme.desc: Moll is stifled by her surroundings, but too beholden to her family to break away. When she meets Pascal, a free-spirited stranger, a whole new world opens up to her.

programme.title: Colette
programme.desc: Set at the dawn of the modern age, this is the story of a woman who has been long denied her voice going to extraordinary lengths to reclaim it.

programme.title: McKellen: Playing the Part
programme.desc: Built upon a 14-hour interview, this film is a unique journey through the key landmarks of McKellen's life.

programme.title: Le Week-End
programme.desc: A long-married couple revisit Paris for a long weekend for the first time since their honeymoon, in hopes of rekindling their relationship - or, perhaps, to bring it to an end.

programme.title: Tea with the Dames
programme.desc: Four old friends will reflect on their lives and careers, as they spend a weekend together at the retreat once shared by Joan Plowright and Laurence Olivier.

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: The captivating, true story of a man who discovers the Japanese officer who tortured him during the war is still alive, and sets out to confront him.

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Seventeen days before WWII, a teacher must try to exonerate himself in time to save the hearts and minds of his students from the grip of Hitler.

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: An inspiration film that explores the brilliance of a mathematician that many believed could decipher the very fabric of the universe - possibly existence itself.

programme.title: Versus: The Life & Films of Ken Loach
programme.desc: Ken Loach reflects on his 50-year career in socially aware dramas and documentaries, sharing successes, controversies, and personal challenges with insights from friends and family.

programme.title: The Banksy Job
programme.desc: A documentary exploring the infamous theft of street artist Banksy's sculpture, The Drinker, and the ensuing battle with the art terrorist: AK47.

programme.title: Hurricane
programme.desc: The tale of the Polish pilot who alongside his comrades of the Polish Air Force, joins the British Royal Air Force to fight during the Battle of Britain.

programme.title: Ali & Ava
programme.desc: Ali and Ava, both lonely for different reasons, meet and sparks fly. A connection grows, despite the legacy of Ava's past relationship, and Ali's turmoil at the breakdown of his marriage.

programme.title: How to Talk to Girls at Parties
programme.desc: An alien touring the galaxy breaks away from her group and meets two young inhabitants of the most dangerous place in the universe: the London suburb of Croydon.

programme.title: A Little Chaos
programme.desc: This period drama tells the tale of two landscape artists who become romantically involved while constructing the grand gardens at King Louis XIV's palace at Versailles.

programme.title: Tommy's Honour
programme.desc: Tom and Tommy Morris, father and son pioneers of professional golf, rely on skill, business acumen, and working-class street smarts to make Tommy one of the world's first sports superstars.

programme.title: Last Days In The Desert
programme.desc: An imagined chapter from Jesus' forty days of fasting and praying in the desert. On his way out of the wilderness, Jesus struggles with the Devil over the fate of a family in crisis.

programme.title: FairyTale: A True Story
programme.desc: Based on a true story of two children in 1917 who take photos believed by some to be the first scientific evidence of the existence of fairies.

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: The inspiring true love story of Robin and Diana Cavendish, an adventurous couple who refuse to give up in the face of a devastating disease.

programme.title: The Banksy Job
programme.desc: A documentary exploring the infamous theft of street artist Banksy's sculpture, The Drinker, and the ensuing battle with the art terrorist: AK47.

programme.title: Creation
programme.desc: Charles Darwin struggles to find a balance between his ideas of evolution and his relationship with his devout wife.

programme.title: The Liability
programme.desc: UK. A weary assassin hires a gangster's cocky stepson as his driver to show him the ropes. But a stunning woman upsets the applecart after a hit in this witty caper.

programme.title: White Riot
programme.desc: Telling the story of a vital national protest movement: Rock Against Racism, formed in 1976 when a group of artists united to take on the National Front.

programme.title: Madame Bovary
programme.desc: Trapped in a loveless marriage and eager for excitement, a doctor's wife seeks love and fulfilment outside the bonds of matrimony.

programme.title: A Guide To Second Date Sex
programme.desc: Laura and Ryan have been totally destroyed by previous relationships. In the hope of getting it right, they go on a second date having no idea what they're supposed to do.

programme.title: God Help The Girl
programme.desc: Life has never been easy for Eve, but this troubled young girl has a talent and songwriting becomes her way forward. Through her passion for music, she's led to Glasgow's music scene.

programme.title: Death Defying Acts
programme.desc: Houdini starts an affair with a psychic out to con the famous escapologist. As the stakes get higher, it soon becomes a question of who is out-conning who.

programme.title: Farming
programme.desc: A young Nigerian boy is sent to be raised by a white British family in the hopes of a better future, and instead becomes the leader of a white skinhead gang.

programme.title: Churchill
programme.desc: A ticking-clock thriller following Winston Churchill in the 96 hours before D-day.

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
programme.desc: T'was the night before Christmas, when a zombie apocalypse threatened a sleepy town. Anna and her friends must fight, slash, and sing their way to survival.

programme.title: Mr. Holmes
programme.desc: An aged, retired Sherlock Holmes deals with early dementia as he tries to remember both his final case and a mysterious woman whose memory haunts him.

programme.title: The Duke
programme.desc: In 1961, Kempton Bunton, a 60-year-old taxi driver, steals Goya's portrait of the Duke of Wellington from the National Gallery in London. What happened next became the stuff of legend.

programme.title: The Dinosaur Project
programme.desc: In this special effects thriller, a film crew in the Congo discover a lost world filled with terrifying, giant creatures thought extinct for millions of years.

programme.title: Starter For 10
programme.desc: Working-class kid, Brian struggles to make his way in an upper-class university. This bitter-sweet comedy is about loyalty, falling in love, and the difference between knowledge and wisdom.

programme.title: I Am Slave
programme.desc: A thriller set in London's slave trade and centred on a woman's fight for freedom.

programme.title: Tea with the Dames
programme.desc: Four old friends will reflect on their lives and careers, as they spend a weekend together at the retreat once shared by Joan Plowright and Laurence Olivier.

programme.title: Sorry We Missed You
programme.desc: Ricky's family have been fighting against debt since the 2008 financial crash. An opportunity arises to wrestle back some independence, but it's hard work to avoid breaking point.

programme.title: On Chesil Beach
programme.desc: In 1962 England, a young couple find their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure.

programme.title: Vita and Virginia
programme.desc: In 1920's, London, Virginia Wolf meets fellow author Vita Sackville-West. Despite both of them being married, they embark on an affair that later inspires a novel.

programme.title: The Best Offer
programme.desc: A master auctioneer becomes obsessed with an extremely reclusive heiress and collector of fine art, who he has never actually met.

programme.title: The Limehouse Golem
programme.desc: When a series of brutal murders occur in London, the community believes that a legendary dark creature must be responsible.

programme.title: Age of Heroes
programme.desc: This action adventure documents the true story of the elite 30 Commando unit, formed during World War II by the man who would later become novelist Ian Fleming, and their risky mission in Norway.

programme.title: The Bookshop
programme.desc: Set in a small town in 1959 England, a woman decides, against polite but ruthless local opposition, to open a bookshop, a decision which becomes a political minefield.

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: After a job goes wrong, two hit men are ordered by their crime boss to cool their heels in Bruges. They don't make good tourists and soon find themselves in the oddest of circumstances.

programme.title: Into the White
programme.desc: During World War II, enemy fighter pilots find themselves face to face after shooting down one another's planes over a desolate landscape. In order to survive, they must set aside the rules of war.

programme.title: Cheri
programme.desc: In this superb drama set in pre-World War I Paris, an ageing courtesan has an ill-fated love affair with the son of her rival.

programme.title: Red Joan
programme.desc: Inspired by the true story of English born Joan Stanley who was recruited by the KGB in the mid 1930s and went undetected as a British spy for over a half a century.

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: Based on the First World War memoir by Vera Brittain, this tells the tale of one woman's searing journey from youthful hopes and dreams to the edge of despair and back again.

programme.title: The Best Offer
programme.desc: A master auctioneer becomes obsessed with an extremely reclusive heiress and collector of fine art, who he has never actually met.

programme.title: Mothering Sunday
programme.desc: In 1924, house maid and foundling Jane Fairchild has the rare chance to spend quality time with her secret lover, but events that neither can foresee will change the course of Jane's life forever.

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: The inspiring true love story of Robin and Diana Cavendish, an adventurous couple who refuse to give up in the face of a devastating disease.

programme.title: Calvary
programme.desc: In this compelling drama a compassionate priest and estranged father confronts his own demons as he senses the menacing forces of his scornful parish closing in around him.

programme.title: Macbeth
programme.desc: After murdering the King of Scotland and taking the throne, Macbeth begins to unravel as he becomes consumed with paranoia and guilt.

programme.title: Oranges and Sunshine
programme.desc: A powerful true story about a social worker who risks all in her effort to reunite families torn apart by a heartless government policy.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: This story follows Maurice, a streetwise cat, who has the perfect money-making scam. He finds a dumb-looking kid who plays a pipe and has his very own horde of rats.

programme.title: Bend It Like Beckham
programme.desc: An Indian girl born in England disobeys her strict family in search of a dream: becoming a soccer star like her idol, David Beckham.

programme.title: The Man Who Invented Christmas
programme.desc: Tells the tale of the magical journey that led to the creation of "A Christmas Carol" forever changing the holiday season we celebrate today.

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: The true story of the King of Bechuanaland, and the London office worker he married despite fierce opposition from the British and South African governments.

programme.desc: Japan has 9 million vacant homes. We investigate the issue of vacant homes in Japan and see how they're being used creatively to promote population growth and regional revitalization.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Chichibu is a mountainous region with lots of natural beauty. Cats keep watch over a field of red spider lilies and even guide visitors through the mountains! We also meet a cat who lives at a shrine.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.desc: Davao, located on Mindanao Island, is home to 1.7 million people. Global business such as call centers are now thriving here. This city is often cited as being one of the safest in the Philippines.

programme.desc: The Hida region in Gifu Prefecture has some of Japan's most extensive broadleaf forests and has been home to artisans who possess sophisticated woodworking skills, such as kigumi or wood joinery.

programme.title: KAIZOKU
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Seto Inland Sea.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Disaster training is advancing with digital technology. See how AR/VR technology is helping participants gain realistic experience about the movement of smoke in fires and the risks of a tsunami.

programme.title: Friday Feels
programme.desc: Your weekend starts here! Pop hits, familiar favourites, and feel-good fun.

programme.title: Sunrise Set
programme.desc: Feel-good favourites to start your morning right.

programme.title: Totally Timeless
programme.desc: The ultimate mix of guitar-driven anthems and singalong favourites. From soaring choruses to easy rock staples, these are the tracks that never go out of style.

programme.title: Lords of Chaos
programme.desc: The origins of Norwegian Black Metal and a group of young men with a flair for publicity, church-burning and murder.

programme.title: What Lies Below
programme.desc: A 16-year-old girl returns home from camp and learns her mother has a new boyfriend, one she intends to marry; a man whose charm, intelligence and beauty make him look like he's not human at all.

programme.title: A Bittersweet Life
programme.desc: A gangster starts a violent feud after he refuses to kill his boss's cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Final Cut
programme.desc: Life imitates art when the cast and crew of a low-budget zombie flick start to turn into the living dead.

programme.title: The Paper Tigers
programme.desc: Three Kung Fu prodigies have grown into washed-up, middle-aged men. But when their master is murdered, they must juggle their dead-end jobs, dad duties, and old grudges to avenge his death.

programme.title: The Wind
programme.desc: Lizzy is settling a remote stretch of land on the 19th-century American frontier, when she begins to sense a sinister presence that seems to be borne of the land itself.

programme.title: Good Boy
programme.desc: Christian, a millionaire heir, meets Sigrid, a young student, on a dating app. They hit it off, but there's only one problem: Christian lives with Frank, a man who dresses up and constantly acts like a dog.

programme.title: Howling VI: The Freaks
programme.desc: A villainous carnival owner traps a young werewolf to include in his growing menagerie of inhuman exhibits.

programme.title: Hell House LLC
programme.desc: Five years after 15 people were killed during a haunted house tour, a documentary crew visits the scene to investigate what really happened.

programme.title: Re-Animator
programme.desc: A medical student (Jeffrey Combs) brings his headless professor back from the dead with a special serum.

programme.title: Bride of Re-Animator
programme.desc: A mad doctor and his accomplice return to the scene of a zombie massacre to continue their bodybuilding experiments.

programme.title: Beyond Re-Animator
programme.desc: The imprisoned Dr West continues his gruesome experiments with the aid of the new jailhouse physician.

programme.title: The Stunt man
programme.desc: A fugitive stumbles onto a movie set just when they need a new stunt man, takes the job as a way to hide out and falls for the leading lady while facing off with his manipulative director.

programme.title: Police Story 3: Super Cop
programme.desc: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

programme.title: Society
programme.desc: A Beverly Hills teen (Billy Warlock) discovers his parents are part of a gruesome orgy cult for the social elite.

programme.title: Joint Security Area
programme.desc: After a shooting incident at the North-South Korean border DMZ leaves two North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss and Swedish team investigates what actually happened.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II
programme.desc: The heroes in a half-shell are back. Our fearsome foursome go after the glowing canister that has slipped into the hands of the evil Shredder and his mutant allies, Rahzar and Tokka.

programme.title: The Fall
programme.desc: A bedridden stuntman entrances a little girl with tales of exotic heroes. As his health reaches the point of peril so does the story he's telling, with dramatic consequences. An epic fantasy.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Paranoia drives this hi-tech cyber thriller when a computer programmer who turns to corporate espionage is caught in a spiral where even his own identity is put in doubt.

programme.title: The Navigator: A Medieval Odyssey
programme.desc: A young 14th Century boy with acute psychic powers believes that he can rescue his fellow villagers by tunnelling their way through the earth. To their surprise they come out in New Zealand in 1988.

programme.title: Quest for Fire
programme.desc: A prehistoric Cro-Magnon tribe depends on an ever-burning source of fire, which eventually extinguishes. Lacking the knowledge of how to start a new one, the tribe sends three warriors on a quest.

programme.title: Vesper
programme.desc: Struggling to survive with her father after the collapse of Earth's ecosystem, 13-year-old Vesper must use her wits, strength and bio-hacking abilities to fight for the future.

programme.title: Oasis
programme.desc: An irresponsible and childish ex-con befriends a girl with cerebral palsy and develops a progressively stronger bond with her.

programme.title: Noroi: The Curse
programme.desc: A paranormal journalist named Kobayashi goes missing shortly after completing a documentary. What begins as an investigation into strange noises soon evolves into the chilling mystery of a demonic entity.

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: Late one night on a country road, Tun and Jane accidentally run over a mysterious pedestrian. Fleeing the scene, they return to their lives in Bangkok, but soon discover things have changed.

programme.title: Howling IV: The Original Nightmare
programme.desc: A successful author moves to a small town after suffering a mental breakdown and is tormented by demons and werewolves.

programme.title: House of the Devil
programme.desc: Financially struggling college student Samantha takes a strange babysitting job that coincides with a full lunar eclipse. She slowly realizes her clients harbor a terrifying secret.

programme.title: Police Story
programme.desc: A kung-fu policeman (Jackie Chan) must protect a female witness (Brigitte Lin) from a Hong Kong drug lord for whom she used to work.

programme.title: Police Story 2
programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop's unusual policing methods result in his demotion to traffic duty, despite his success in fighting crime. Meanwhile, an old enemy is released from prison and sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Timecrimes
programme.desc: A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.

programme.title: The Chaser
programme.desc: A cop investigates the disappearance of several call girls he pimps out.

programme.title: Eyes Without a Face
programme.desc: A surgeon causes a car accident which leaves his daughter disfigured and goes to extreme lengths to give her a new face.

programme.title: Dollman vs. Demonic Toys
programme.desc: Judith Grey teams with Brick Bardo (Dollman) and his girlfriend Ginger to face the evil Demonic Toys for one final battle.

programme.title: Hell House LLC III: Lake Of Fire
programme.desc: The Abaddon Hotel will once again be open to the public. Russell Wynn has taken his audience-interactive show, Insomnia, into the abandoned hotel that is rumored to be haunted.

programme.title: Terrifier
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Tara Heyes finds herself as the obsession of a sadistic murderer known as Art the Clown.

programme.title: Terrifier 2
programme.desc: Resurrected by a sinister entity, Art the Clown returns to Miles County to terrorise a teenage girl and her younger brother on Halloween night.

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: A reluctant IRA agent discovers that some people just aren't who you expect them to be.

programme.title: Day of the Dead
programme.desc: The flesh-eating undead have wiped out every last vestige of the civilised world. Deep underground, a group of scientists and soldiers work to find a cure for the unstoppable plague.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: A story told both forwards and backwards in time about an ex- insurance investigator, unable to remember new thoughts, who uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.

programme.title: Project Wolf Hunting
programme.desc: When dangerous criminals on a cargo ship are transported from the Phillipines to South Korea, they unleash a sinister force after an escape attempt leads to a riot.

programme.title: Sasquatch Sunset
programme.desc: In the misty forests of North America, a family of Sasquatches find themselves on a collision course with the ever-changing world around them.

programme.title: The Thicket
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter and a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer, they find themselves in a deadly no-man's-land known as the Thicket.

programme.title: Vivarium
programme.desc: A young couple looking for the perfect home find themselves trapped in a mysterious labyrinth-like neighbourhood of identical houses.

programme.title: Sound of Silence
programme.desc: Emma must uncover the dark secret behind a cursed radio to survive and protect her family.

programme.title: Good Boy
programme.desc: Christian, a millionaire heir, meets Sigrid, a young student, on a dating app. They hit it off, but there's only one problem: Christian lives with Frank, a man who dresses up and constantly acts like a dog.

programme.title: The Parts You Lose
programme.desc: A young boy in a small North Dakota town befriends a potentially dangerous fugitive.

programme.title: Puppet Master
programme.desc: After being contacted by their mysterious former colleague, four psychics arrive at a secluded hotel where they are stalked by a group of murderous puppets.

programme.title: Puppet Master II
programme.desc: The malicious marionettes are back to resurrect their dead master and evict parapsychologists from the family estate.

programme.title: Sympathy For The Devil
programme.desc: After being forced to drive a mysterious passenger at gunpoint, a man finds himself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse where it becomes clear that not everything is as it seems.

programme.title: Coming Home In The Dark
programme.desc: A school teacher is forced to confront a brutal act from his past when a pair of ruthless drifters takes him and his family on a nightmare road-trip.

programme.title: Severance
programme.desc: A bonding weekend goes horribly wrong for seven colleagues who find themselves facing the chop when they are sabotaged by a deadly enemy. Only the smartest will survive this brutal office outing.

programme.title: The Raid
programme.desc: A SWAT team is trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs. Stranded on the sixth floor, they must fight their way through the city's worst to survive.

programme.title: Black Death
programme.desc: Set during the time of the first outbreak of bubonic plague in England, a young monk is given the task of learning the truth about reports of people being brought back to life in a small village.

programme.title: Come To Daddy
programme.desc: Norval, a privileged man-child travels to the beautiful and remote cabin of his estranged father, in order to reconnect with him as he hasn't seen him in 30 years.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Detective Joe Kozenczak (Michael Riley) tracks down John Wayne Gacy (Brian Dennehy), convicted in 1980 of 33 Chicago serial killings.

programme.title: Wrong Place
programme.desc: A meth cook hunts down the former police chief in order to silence him before he can deliver eyewitness testimony against his family, but ultimately finds himself up against more than he had bargained for.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: China. Chen Wing Yan, a young police officer, has been sent undercover as a mole in the local mafia. Lau Kin Ming, a young mafia member, infiltrates the police force. (Subtitles)

programme.title: Dark Diamond
programme.desc: France. After his father's death, a man vows vengeance against the relatives who abandoned him. (Subtitles).

programme.title: Thesis
programme.desc: A Spanish film student (Ana Torrent) finds a videotape showing the torture and murder of a missing coed.

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: Sole-survivor of a plane crash, and stranded deep within the Arctic Circle, Overgard is waiting to be rescued, when a sudden turn of events finds him no longer on his own.

programme.title: The Science of Sleep
programme.desc: A man entranced by his dreams and imagination is love-struck with a French woman and feels he can show her his world.

programme.title: Lars and the Real Girl
programme.desc: Lars is content with his artificial girlfriend; a life-sized doll named Bianca. But when he develops feelings for an attractive co-worker, Lars finds himself lost in a unique love triangle.

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A very handsome gentleman finds the love of his life, but suffers an accident and needs to have his face reconstructed through surgery after being severely disfigured.

programme.title: Beyond Re-Animator
programme.desc: The imprisoned Dr West continues his gruesome experiments with the aid of the new jailhouse physician.

programme.title: Showgirls
programme.desc: Nomi Malone has what it takes to make it as a Las Vegas showgirl - what she doesn't have is a way in. To survive, she accepts the only job available, lap dancing at a seedy club.

programme.title: Joint Security Area
programme.desc: After a shooting incident at the North-South Korean border DMZ leaves two North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss and Swedish team investigates what actually happened.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: From their base in the city sewers, turtle heroes Michelangelo, Raphael, Leonardo and Donatello are on a mission to defeat an evil warlord and wipe out crime.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II
programme.desc: The heroes in a half-shell are back. Our fearsome foursome go after the glowing canister that has slipped into the hands of the evil Shredder and his mutant allies, Rahzar and Tokka.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
programme.desc: When a magic sceptre accidentally transports April back through time to 16th-century Japan, the boys take off in hot pursuit, cowabungling their way right out of the sewers.

programme.title: crowdDJ Trending Top 40
programme.desc: The ultimate snapshot of what's hot right now. These are Australia's most-requested tracks on crowdDJ, from viral hits to global chart-toppers-powered by Nightlife Music.

programme.title: Vibe Check
programme.desc: Feel-good favourites that lift your mood and keep the energy up.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: After doing time for insider trading, an entrepreneur wastes no time in devising a winner-take-all plan to rebuild her empire.

programme.title: Early Man
programme.desc: Caveman Dug, his sidekick, Hognob, and their fearless new friend, Goona, must unite their Stone Age tribe against the mighty Bronze Age enemy, Lord Nooth.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A Portokalos family secret brings the beloved characters back together for an even bigger and Greeker wedding.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: A gentle giant of a prisoner with supernatural powers brings a sense of spirit and humanity to the guards and inmates on death row.

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc: Two perfect lovers, torn apart by disapproving families, find each other later in life when the woman is engaged to a handsome soldier. Can they rekindle their feelings?

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Love's causing chaos all over London. Even the PM is smitten. Ten separate stories intertwine in a Christmas Eve climax.

programme.title: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: A divorced newspaper researcher finds a love letter in a bottle washed up on a beach and tracks it to a grieving widower.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: This erotic romance charts the masochistic relationship between a sexually inexperienced woman and a steely businessman who harbours painful and long buried secrets from his past.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with 23 distinct personalities and they must try to escape before the next one emerges.

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Legendary monster hunter Van Helsing must rely on the help of the beautiful and mysterious Anna Valeris as he engages in an epic battle with the ultimate forces of darkness.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Can a clueless super spy save the day without denting the nation's pride, or his super-cool Aston Martin spy car?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po is now living his dream as The Dragon Warrior. But his new life is threatened by the emergence of a formidable villain, who plans to use a secret weapon to conquer China.

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is a London museum guard sent to Los Angeles in charge of a priceless painting. Mayhem erupts when the famously eccentric simpleton is mistaken for an art expert.

programme.title: Chicken Run
programme.desc: A smooth-talking rooster crash-lands into a farm and attempts to help a group of chickens escape. With teamwork and a little bit of cluck, the fearless flock plots one last daring attempt for freedom.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: When genetically modified dinosaurs run amok at a new themed resort, a former military man and animal expert must use his special skills to halt an all-out prehistoric slaughter.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: The CIA's most dangerous former operative is drawn out of hiding to uncover more explosive truths about his past.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' the Lorax
programme.desc: A young boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. He must discover the story of the Lorax, the creature who fights to protect his world.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: Set in the mythical world of burly Vikings and fire-breathing dragons, a Viking teenager takes in an injured dragon and sees an opportunity to set his tribe on a new course.

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: It has been four years since the disaster at Jurassic Park and two groups are in a race against time that will determine the fate of the remote island's prehistoric inhabitants.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An unforgettable and hilarious portrait of life's most rewarding occupation: Parenthood. The Buckmans are a modern-day family facing the age-old dilemma of trying to raise children the right way.

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: What's a couple of stay-at-home ghosts to do when their beloved home is taken over by yuppies? They call on Beetlejuice, the afterlife's freelance bio-exorcist, to scare off the family.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Earth is covered with water and the human race struggles to survive on dilapidated boats and makeshift floating cities.

programme.title: Grand-Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: When Frank Collins suffers from writer's block, he decides to start a day care for his father-in-law and other seniors as a way to make quick cash.

programme.title: Lion
programme.desc: A young Indian boy gets lost on the streets of Calcutta, miles from home. He is eventually adopted by an Australian couple, but years later he sets out to find his lost family.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: The accidental secret agent returns, sent on a mission to stop a group of international assassins before they eliminate a Chinese leader and cause global chaos.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A seven-year-old's life is changed forever with the arrival of a suit-wearing, briefcase-carrying baby: his new baby brother.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold are BFFs who accidentally hypnotise their principal into believing he's the hero named Captain Underpants. They must stop a new teacher who is bent on ridding the world of laughter.

programme.title: Antz
programme.desc: A worker ant changes roles with a soldier ant to woo a forbidden princess.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: The leading lady in a movie is abducted as a sacrifice for a giant ape in this jaw-dropping, triple Oscar-winning remake of the 1933 classic.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: When Troll Village is invaded by the Bergens, two mismatched trolls must try and tolerate each other as they set out on a journey to rescue their friends.

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: When a Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home, he finds himself lost and alone at Paddington Station. This charming family comedy is based on the classic children's books.

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: The eccentric Dr Dolittle sets sail on an epic adventure to a mythical island, regaining his wit and courage as he crosses old adversaries and discovers wondrous creatures.

programme.title: Early Man
programme.desc: Caveman Dug, his sidekick, Hognob, and their fearless new friend, Goona, must unite their Stone Age tribe against the mighty Bronze Age enemy, Lord Nooth.

programme.title: Last Night In Soho
programme.desc: Edgar Wright's psychological thriller follows a young woman mysteriously able to enter the glamorous 1960s, where the dreams of the past splinter into something darker.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: Pulled from the sea, Jason Bourne discovers he has the skills of a very dangerous man and no memory of his past.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A frantic call for help from a remote research station on Mars sends a team of mercenary Marines into action.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: A group of European mercenaries become embroiled in the defense of the Great Wall of China in this epic adventure.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: When a cute alien lands on Earth and finds himself on the run from his own race, he forms an unlikely friendship with a brave little girl who's on a quest of her own.

programme.title: Megamind
programme.desc: Megamind is the most brilliant super-villain the world has ever known - and the least successful. But when Metro City is threatened by a new villain, can the world's biggest 'mind' actually save the day?

programme.title: Monsters Vs Aliens
programme.desc: Follows the adventures of BOB, Link, Dr Cockroach, and Susan as they learn to adapt to a new world and work side-by-side.

programme.title: A Cinderella Story
programme.desc: A student is controlled by her wicked stepmother and stepsisters, but her anonymous email buddy is a real Prince Charming. Will she turn into a pumpkin when they finally meet at the school dance?

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: A decade after Mamma Mia! sang and danced its way into the hearts of audiences around the world, the original cast are back.

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: Wealthy hunters pay for the right to stalk and kill the most challenging prey of them all: man.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The plump black-and-white bear, Po, is back in his biggest adventure yet.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: An ogre, with the help of an annoying donkey, tries to win back his swamp by returning a princess to a scheming lord.

programme.title: Puss in Boots
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots was blamed for a bank robbery in San Ricardo, engineered against his wishes by Humpty Dumpty, Puss leaves Humpty to his fate. Now reunited, they try to trust each other again.

programme.title: Girls Trip
programme.desc: Four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for the annual Essence Festival. There's enough dancing, drinking, brawling and romancing to make the Big Easy blush.

programme.title: River Wild
programme.desc: A thrill-seeking trip quickly turns into a desperate fight for survival when white-water rafters become stranded in raging rapids, and someone seems intent on sabotage to ensure shocking secrets stay buried.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne is racing to solve the mystery of his past while being hunted by the very organisation that hired him.

programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: Sudden death takes on a whole new meaning in this suspenseful action tale where a retired fire-fighter's daughter gets caught up in a terrorist's plan to blow up 17,000 hockey fans.

programme.title: Benchwarmers 2: Breaking Balls
programme.desc: After his big league dreams are crushed, Ben McGrath is reluctant to take another swing at redemption for his boss' law firm softball team.

programme.title: The 'Burbs
programme.desc: Suburbanite Ray Peterson's plan for a peaceful vacation is disturbed by a creepy new family on the block in this outrageous suspense-comedy directed by Joe Dante.

programme.title: Honey: Rise Up and Dance
programme.desc: An aspiring and determined street dancer comes out of the shadow of her trained dancer sister, and joins a dance competition to win the prize of a college scholarship.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: It's high-seas adventure when legendary swashbuckler Sinbad, his loyal pooch Spike, and the daring Princess Marina face off against the trickster Goddess of Chaos and her mischievous monsters.

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: A freak lab accident reveals Bruce's heroic impulses, but also unleashes his inner demons, and he becomes the most powerful being on the face of the Earth: a superhero and a monster.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the immortal Guardians must join forces for the first time to protect the hopes, beliefs and imagination of children all over the world.

programme.title: The Prince of Egypt
programme.desc: This is the extraordinary tale of two brothers, one born of royal blood, one an orphan with a secret past. Their final confrontation will forever change their lives - and the world.

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: Curse Of Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is a London museum guard sent to Los Angeles in charge of a priceless painting. Mayhem erupts when the famously eccentric simpleton is mistaken for an art expert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean can't believe his luck when he wins a camcorder and an all-expense paid holiday to the French Riviera. But during his journey to the south, he falls face first into a series of mishaps.

programme.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Andy Stitzer has gone 40 years without a woman and his pals are out to break his luck. Can he survive their hilariously bad advice? Will he find love and get laid?

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2: Sorority Rising
programme.desc: Mac and Kelly decide to sell and move to the suburbs. But when a sorority moves in and threatens the sale, they must team up with their former enemy Teddy, to bring the girls down.

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: After a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all of the active undercover agents in Britain, Johnny English is forced to come out of retirement to find the mastermind hacker.

programme.title: Nanny McPhee and the Big Bang
programme.desc: Nanny McPhee helps a stressed young mother trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war.

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: What's a couple of stay-at-home ghosts to do when their beloved home is taken over by yuppies? They call on Beetlejuice, the afterlife's freelance bio-exorcist, to scare off the family.

programme.title: Innerspace
programme.desc: A test pilot is miniaturised in a secret experiment, and accidentally injected into a hapless store clerk.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Hobbs has been tracking an organisation of lethally skilled drivers. The only way to stop the criminal mercenaries from stealing a top-secret weapon is to outmatch them at street level.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: A quick-witted terrier finds his position in the household threatened when his master brings home a stray mongrel with no polish.
